scenario.name: UAC INVITE with Auth and SDP
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[field3]@[field2]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "4921163555552" <sip:[field0]@[field2]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: "sut" <sip:[field3]@[field2]:[remote_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Contact: <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;reg-id=1 Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test User-Agent: some useragent Allow: INVITE, ACK, CANCEL, OPTIONS, BYE, REFER, SUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY, INFO, PUBLISH Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 8 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000

ACK sip:[field3]@[field2] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch-3] From: "4921163555552" <sip:[field0]@[field2]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] [last_To] [routes] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] ACK Contact: <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port];reg-id=1 Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test User-Agent: some useragent Content-Length: 0

INVITE sip:[field3]@[field2]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "4921163555552" <sip:[field0]@[field2]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: sut <sip:[field3]@[field2]:[remote_port]> [routes] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Contact: <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;reg-id=1 Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test User-Agent: some useragent Allow: INVITE, ACK, CANCEL, OPTIONS, BYE, REFER, SUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY, INFO, PUBLISH [field1] Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 8 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000

ACK [next_url] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch-3] From: "4921163555552" <sip:[field0]@[field2]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] [last_To] [routes] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] ACK Contact: <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;reg-id=1 Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test User-Agent: some useragent Content-Length: 0

BYE [next_url] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "4921163555552" <sip:[field0]@[field2]>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] [last_To] [routes] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] BYE Contact: <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;reg-id=1 Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test User-Agent: some useragent Content-Length: 0
